revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=LB-LINK |model=BL-WR4000 |revision=A |est_release_date=08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2ANAM-EL001 |pcb_id=BL-R7628AE4 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN, 1717-AJCSL, EAP0Z834; |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205D |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A-5T |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN, 1717-AJCSL, EAP0Z834; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=B-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^B-LINK [A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.16.1 |default_user=admin |oui=EC:3D:FD |oui_eth=EC:3D:FD }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.lb-link.cn/products-detail.php?ProId=108 Product page] (''LB-LINK'')
"BL-R7628AE4 V1.0" and "1730" is silkscreened on the board. :[[Edgeless EL001]] has the same text on the board.
==Images== <gallery caption="Inside"> File:BL-R7628AE4-V1-pcb-top.jpg|PCB top </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
